tool_description: Amazon Data Scrapper is the easiest way to get access to product, price, sales rank and reviews data from Amazon in JSON format.
name: ZNG Amazon Data Scrapper
title: ZNG Amazon Data Scrapper

api_list.name: Get Amazon Product Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zng-amazon-data-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com/products/B081FZV45H"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zng-amazon-data-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://zng-amazon-data-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zng-amazon-data-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
